name: Origins of Malu (Canceled)
blurb: Origins of Malu is about creative, fun, and large scale battles!

rewards.reward: Bronze Forum Badge / Special Access to the Kick Starter Only Forum
Bronze Forum Badge / Special Access to the Kick Starter Only Forum / A Kick starter Only in-game vanity hat / A digital download copy of the game.

All Bronze Tier Rewards (except Kickstarter Bronze Collector's Edition), a Silver Forum Badge, Closed Beta Key, a special Kickstarter Only Relic Appearance Changer and Dye Kit, allowing you to give your favorite weapons and armor a new look, an additional digital download (total of 2), a mention of your name in the credits, a Kickstarter Only special House Piece, a Lithu Guard Dog pet and a Kickstarter Silver Collector's Edition boxed copy of the game containing a signed Thank You Card, Origins of Malu decals, a Soft Cover Art Book, an Origins of Malu T-Shirt and an Origins of Malu cloth patch.

Special Limited Reward!! The first 100 backers at the $250 tier will get the chance to control an NPC Boss Monster during 1 Scheduled Event!!\r\n\r\nAll Bronze Tier Rewards (except Kickstarter Bronze Collector's Edition), a Silver Forum Badge, Closed Beta Key, a special Kickstarter Only Relic Appearance Changer and Dye Kit, allowing you to give your favorite weapons and armor a new look, an additional digital download (total of 2), a mention of your name in the credits, a Kickstarter Only special House Piece, a Lithu Guard Dog pet and a Kickstarter Silver Collector's Edition boxed copy of the game containing a signed Thank You Card, Origins of Malu decals, a Soft Cover Art Book, an Origins of Malu T-Shirt and an Origins of Malu cloth patch.

All Bronze and Silver Tier Rewards, a Purple Platinum Forum Badge, a Zufe plush toy, a custom named NPC tailored to your specifications, the chance to name a consumable item in the game, and a Kickstarter Silver Collector's Edition boxed copy of the game containing a signed Thank You Card, Origins of Malu decals, a Soft Cover Art Book, an Origins of Malu T-Shirt and an Origins of Malu cloth patch.

Special Limited Reward!! The first 100 backers at the $500 tier will get the chance to control an NPC Boss Monster during 1 Scheduled Events , will receive a total of 5 digital download copies of the game and will receive a custom insignia for your house or guild, created by one of our artists and tailored to your specifications!!\r\n\r\nAll Bronze and Silver Tier Rewards, a Purple Platinum Forum Badge, a Zufe plush toy, a custom named NPC tailored to your specifications, the chance to name a consumable item in the game, and a Kickstarter Silver Collector's Edition boxed copy of the game containing a signed Thank You Card, Origins of Malu decals, a Soft Cover Art Book, an Origins of Malu T-Shirt and an Origins of Malu cloth patch.

All Bronze and Silver Tier Rewards, a Purple Platinum Forum Badge, an invitation to the official Origins of Malu launch party (flight + accommodations not included), a Zufe plush toy, a custom named NPC tailored to your specifications, a total of 15 digital download copies of the game, a custom insignia for your house or guild, created by one of our artists and tailored to your specifications, the chance to design an adventure with our dev team, the chance to control an NPC Boss Monster during 10 Scheduled Events and a Kickstarter Ultimate Collector's Edition boxed copy of the game containing a signed Thank You Card, Origins of Malu decals, a Signed Hardcover Art Book, an Origins of Malu T-Shirt, an Origins of Malu cloth patch and your choice of a Jolah, Toljon or Qulinta figurine.
